attributes.action: Stop Donald Trump entering the UK after his recent description of Immigrants
attributes.additional_details: Given that he is from immigrant stock it is doubly appalling that he used this language and must surely mean that he is referring to immigrants of colour rather than white Europeans. We fail to see how this behaviour is acceptable in any right thinking society and wish the UK government to send the strongest possible message that this will not be tolerated by not allowing Mr Trump access into the UK
attributes.background:
https://www.facebook.com/TheOther98/videos/2433353233342307/
Donald Trump has recently described immigrants as animals which is hate speech pure and simple.
